15namespace v8_inspector {
16
17class InspectedContext::WeakCallbackData {
18 public:
19 WeakCallbackData(InspectedContext* context, V8InspectorImpl* inspector,
20 int groupId, int contextId)
21 : m_context(context),
22 m_inspector(inspector),
23 m_groupId(groupId),
24 m_contextId(contextId) {}
25
26 static void resetContext(const v8::WeakCallbackInfo<WeakCallbackData>& data) {
27 // InspectedContext is alive here because weak handler is still alive.
28 data.GetParameter()->m_context->m_weakCallbackData = nullptr;
29 data.GetParameter()->m_context->m_context.Reset();
30 data.SetSecondPassCallback(&callContextCollected);
31 }
32
33 static void callContextCollected(
34 const v8::WeakCallbackInfo<WeakCallbackData>& data) {
35 // InspectedContext can be dead here since anything can happen between first
36 // and second pass callback.
37 WeakCallbackData* callbackData = data.GetParameter();
38 callbackData->m_inspector->contextCollected(callbackData->m_groupId,
39 callbackData->m_contextId);
40 delete callbackData;
41 }
42
43 private:
44 InspectedContext* m_context;
45 V8InspectorImpl* m_inspector;
46 int m_groupId;
47 int m_contextId;
48};
49
50InspectedContext::InspectedContext(V8InspectorImpl* inspector,
51 const V8ContextInfo& info, int contextId)
52 : m_inspector(inspector),
53 m_context(info.context->GetIsolate(), info.context),
54 m_contextId(contextId),
55 m_contextGroupId(info.contextGroupId),
56 m_origin(toString16(info.origin)),
57 m_humanReadableName(toString16(info.humanReadableName)),
58 m_auxData(toString16(info.auxData)),
59 m_uniqueId(internal::V8DebuggerId::generate(inspector)) {
60 v8::debug::SetContextId(info.context, contextId);
61 m_weakCallbackData =
62 new WeakCallbackData(this, m_inspector, m_contextGroupId, m_contextId);
63 m_context.SetWeak(m_weakCallbackData,
64 &InspectedContext::WeakCallbackData::resetContext,
65 v8::WeakCallbackType::kParameter);
66
67 v8::Context::Scope contextScope(info.context);
68 v8::HandleScope handleScope(info.context->GetIsolate());
69 v8::Local<v8::Object> global = info.context->Global();
70 v8::Local<v8::Value> console;
71 if (!global
72 ->Get(info.context,
73 toV8String(info.context->GetIsolate(), "console"))
74 .ToLocal(&console) ||
75 !console->IsObject()) {
76 return;
77 }
78
79 m_inspector->console()->installAsyncStackTaggingAPI(info.context,
80 console.As<v8::Object>());
81
82 if (info.hasMemoryOnConsole) {
83 m_inspector->console()->installMemoryGetter(info.context,
84 console.As<v8::Object>());
85 }
86}
87
88InspectedContext::~InspectedContext() {
89 // If we destory InspectedContext before weak callback is invoked then we need
90 // to delete data here.
91 if (!m_context.IsEmpty()) delete m_weakCallbackData;
92}
93
94// static
95int InspectedContext::contextId(v8::Local<v8::Context> context) {
96 return v8::debug::GetContextId(context);
97}
98
99v8::Local<v8::Context> InspectedContext::context() const {
100 return m_context.Get(isolate());
101}
102
103v8::Isolate* InspectedContext::isolate() const {
104 return m_inspector->isolate();
105}
106
107bool InspectedContext::isReported(int sessionId) const {
108 return m_reportedSessionIds.find(sessionId) != m_reportedSessionIds.cend();
109}
110
111void InspectedContext::setReported(int sessionId, bool reported) {
112 if (reported)
113 m_reportedSessionIds.insert(sessionId);
114 else
115 m_reportedSessionIds.erase(sessionId);
116}
117
118InjectedScript* InspectedContext::getInjectedScript(int sessionId) {
119 auto it = m_injectedScripts.find(sessionId);
120 return it == m_injectedScripts.end() ? nullptr : it->second.get();
121}
122
123InjectedScript* InspectedContext::createInjectedScript(int sessionId) {
124 std::unique_ptr<InjectedScript> injectedScript =
125 std::make_unique<InjectedScript>(this, sessionId);
126 CHECK(m_injectedScripts.find(sessionId) == m_injectedScripts.end());
127 m_injectedScripts[sessionId] = std::move(injectedScript);
128 return getInjectedScript(sessionId);
129}
130
131void InspectedContext::discardInjectedScript(int sessionId) {
132 m_injectedScripts.erase(sessionId);
133}
134
135bool InspectedContext::addInternalObject(v8::Local<v8::Object> object,
136 V8InternalValueType type) {
137 if (m_internalObjects.IsEmpty()) {
138 m_internalObjects.Reset(isolate(),
139 v8::debug::EphemeronTable::New(isolate()));
140 }
141 v8::Local<v8::debug::EphemeronTable> new_map =
142 m_internalObjects.Get(isolate())->Set(
143 isolate(), object,
144 v8::Integer::New(isolate(), static_cast<int>(type)));
145 m_internalObjects.Reset(isolate(), new_map);
146 return true;
147}
148
149V8InternalValueType InspectedContext::getInternalType(
150 v8::Local<v8::Object> object) {
151 if (m_internalObjects.IsEmpty()) return V8InternalValueType::kNone;
152 v8::Local<v8::Value> typeValue;
153 if (!m_internalObjects.Get(isolate())
154 ->Get(isolate(), object)
155 .ToLocal(&typeValue) ||
156 !typeValue->IsUint32()) {
157 return V8InternalValueType::kNone;
158 }
159 return static_cast<V8InternalValueType>(typeValue.As<v8::Int32>()->Value());
160}
161
162} // namespace v8_inspector
